article_title: First Congo virus death for 2015 in Karachi
article_text:
KARACHI: The first death resulting from the Congo virus was reported in the city on Saturday.



According to Sindh Health Ministry sources, 38-year-old Sabir was a resident of Bhais Colony. He was brought to a private hospital in Karachi yesterday (Friday).



Hospital sources said the patient had high fever and mouth bleeding after which it was confirmed that he was infected with the Congo virus.

article_summary:
KARACHI: The first death resulting from the Congo virus was reported in the city on Saturday.
Hospital sources said the patient had high fever and mouth bleeding after which it was confirmed that he was infected with the Congo virus.
He was brought to a private hospital in Karachi yesterday (Friday).
According to Sindh Health Ministry sources, 38-year-old Sabir was a resident of Bhais Colony.
